details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.2 Properties - Contains Metadata Key
details.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key. The metadata stream dictionary shall contain entry Type with value /Metadata and entry Subtype with value /XML

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key. The metadata stream dictionary shall contain entry Type with value /Metadata and entry Subtype with value /XML

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key or metadata stream dictionary does not contain either entry Type with value /Metadata or entry Subtype with value /XML
